mapper.select: select board_no, board_title, board_content, b.emp_no as "EMP_NO", reg_date, inq_cnt, e.emp_name as "employee.empName" from board b join employee e ON b.emp_no = e.emp_no where b.board_no = #{boardNo}
select file_no ,file_name ,file_savepath from board_attach where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set inq_cnt = inq_cnt+1 where board_no = #{boardNo}
update board set file_no = #{fileNo}, where file_no = #{fileNo}
mapper.select: select file_no ,board_no ,file_name ,file_savepath ,file_mimetype ,file_size ,file_fancysize ,file_downcount from board_attach where file_no = #{fileNo}

SELECT file_no, b.board_no, file_name, file_savepath, file_mimetype, file_size, file_fancysize, file_downcount FROM board b left outer join board_attach ba on(b.board_no = ba.board_no) WHERE board_code = #{boardCode} order by 2 desc
